Installation
============

Setup python environment
------------------------
We encourage you to build an specified python environment for IFS_ETC code.
This can be done using ``conda``:

.. code-block:: console

    conda create -n ifs_etc python=3.7
    conda activate ifs_etc


Install the ETC code
--------------------
To use ifs_etc, install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   pip install ifs_etc
